title: Astronautical
description: I created this game using Unity, C# and Photoshop. It is a 2D Pixel-Art-Game comparable to titles like 'Jetpack Joyride'. You can download it for free on the Google Play Store.

title: WordPress
description: As an apprentice, I worked on a lot of WordPress projects. I learned how to utilize and create custom themes, plugins and Gutenberg blocks.

title: Laravel
description: At my work, i had to help create a Web-Application for clients to interact with our CRM. We used Laravel with Filament v4 to implement the interface between API and clients.

title: PayloadCMS
description: Finding out about Headless CMS was interesting. I am still developing my personal Payload-project, hoping i can use it to create websites for future clients.

title: More Projects
description: Over the course of my education, I have worked on many projects. Some of them are not listed here, but you may find them on my GitHub profile.
